Name: Clubkoffie
Review Text: Great personnel, the owner's a nice guy, the coffee is great and the sandwiches are the best in Amsterdam. The terrace outside offers both good spots in the sun and shade when preferred.

Name: Clubkoffie
Review Text:
Great coffee, friendly staff.
On a budget? Have an espresso standing at the bar and youâ€™ll pay less.
Lunch is really good too. Place might not have the best looks but it makes up for it in a number of ways.

Name: Clubkoffie
Review Text: Very friendly staff and food was delicious. And a good variety to choose from.

Name: Clubkoffie
Review Text: Great coffee, good club sandwiches with a nice selection of ingredients. Plus they played Wu-Tang which on its own deserves the 5-star rating.

Name: Clubkoffie
Review Text: Very kind owner. Good coffee. Big terrace. Take a good look at their logo (and see how often it appears). If you are looking for a chat with the owner; ask about his logo!

Name: Clubkoffie
Review Text: Very good coffee. A fair and nice local place

Name: Clubkoffie
Review Text: Great breakfast, lovely waitress and very good prices.
